name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easy Collector - list data scraper on any webpage

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: a tool to collect list data on any website, super easy to use.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
⭐  Steps: 

1. Open any webpage with list data
2. Start Easy Collector extension
3. Click on webpage to pick data fields, you can preview data when picking
4. Download data csv


⭐ Feature Highlights

- Click to pick any data fields you want
- No need to write any code
- Download data as CSV  file
- Support links and images
- Completely Free
